item.title: COLORS
item.description: Audio-reactive LED wall Installation with Alex Stickels. Shown at ‘The Art of Dying’ at The Laundry SF Using LightJams, programmed a friend’s LED wall to be audio reactive to an original orchestral composition. The viewer put on a SubPac and headphones, along with the lightshow it made for a pertty immersive experience! The score had a huge crescendo, which, along with the lights and SubPac shaking your body made for a pretty epic finale.
